public ElementaryJob createJob(JobConfigurationDTO generalJobConfiguration,

                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException,

Description copied from interface: JobConstructionAddon
Called when this addon should initialize the job (and possibly all of its sub-jobs)according to the configuration.

Specified by:
createJob in interface JobConstructionAddon
Parameters:
generalJobConfiguration - The configuration of this job.
initializer - An interface providing information about the environment in which the job is initialized, and allowing to initialize sub-jobs or even whole measurements.
well - The well in which the job gets initialized, or null if this job will not belong to a well measurement.
positionInformation - The position information with which the job should be initialized.
Returns:
The newly created job.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
ConfigurationException
JobCreationException
